Jump and Hover available as a Chrome Extension and can also be played for free on the website https://unblockedgames6x.org/.
Jump and Hover is a puzzle platform game where the player controls a cube character who must navigate through obstacle-filled levels without dying. The objective is to jump and hover strategically to pass the dangerous platforms and spikes. The player's hover ability only lasts for a short time, so they must carefully time their jumps and plan their movements ahead. Scattered throughout the levels are batteries that can recharge the hover bar, allowing the player to stay airborne for longer. The game requires precision and quick thinking to successfully jump and hover your way to victory through the challenging levels.
